channel.title: Hidden password help
channel.description:
hello I need help to be able to see the letters of people passwords and not just numbers.
I went in client.java and took the thing out to make it clear but it didn't work.
If someone know a pass word in numbers that i can use please post it here.

item.title: Hidden password help
item.dc:creator: @xx_nub_xx xx nub xx
item.description:
@xx_nub_xx wrote:

you only see numbers because their passwords are encrypted. there are tuts about removing encryption on rune-server, and i think there might be one on here but im not sure

Read full topic
